Package sda

Class DisplayMessage

java.lang.Object
sda.DisplayMessage
public class DisplayMessage
extends java.lang.Object
This is a DisplayMessage class it contains all messages to be display

2021-03-05
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hailu

    This method will display a prompt to user for typing the task number to EDIT

  • Constructor Details

    • DisplayMessage

      public DisplayMessage()

  • Method Details

    • displayPage

      public static void displayPage​(int uncompletedTask, int completedTask)
      This method will display the display page on standard output/terminal to display all options for user selection.
      Parameters:
      uncompletedTask - takes the number of incomplete tasks (int) to show in display page
      completedTask - takes the number of complete tasks (int) to show in display page

    • listOfAllTasks

      public static void listOfAllTasks()
      This method displays the menu to standard output/terminal to show the options to display all tasks for user selection

    • editTaskOptions

      public static void editTaskOptions()
      This method will display a prompt to user for typing the task number to EDIT

    • editTaskList

      public static void editTaskList()
      This method will display the Edit menu options on standard output/terminal for user selection

    • greetingMessage

      public static void greetingMessage()
      This method will display the Good bye message while ending the program

    • errorMessage

      public static void errorMessage()
      This method will display the error message if a user input an option which is not from the choices given in main page

    • showMessage

      public static void showMessage​(java.lang.String message, boolean warning)
      This message will display any given message in Red or Green text on standard output/terminal
      Parameters:
      message - a text message as String
      warning - a boolean value, true for printing warning with Red text, and false for printing message in Green text on standard output/terminal

    • separator

      public static void separator​(char charToPrint, int times)
      This message will print the given character on standard output/terminal to given number of times
      Parameters:
      charToPrint - a character given in single quote to print, i.e., '='
      times - an integer to repeat printing the given character
